    module Exception2MessageMapper

    Helper module for easily defining exceptions with predefined messages.

    Usage¶ ↑

    1.

    class Foo
  extend Exception2MessageMapper
  def_e2message ExistingExceptionClass, "message..."
  def_exception :NewExceptionClass, "message..."[, superclass]
  ...
end

    2.

    module Error
  extend Exception2MessageMapper
  def_e2message ExistingExceptionClass, "message..."
  def_exception :NewExceptionClass, "message..."[, superclass]
  ...
end
class Foo
  include Error
  ...
end

foo = Foo.new
foo.Fail ....

    3.

    module Error
  extend Exception2MessageMapper
  def_e2message ExistingExceptionClass, "message..."
  def_exception :NewExceptionClass, "message..."[, superclass]
  ...
end
class Foo
  extend Exception2MessageMapper
  include Error
  ...
end

Foo.Fail NewExceptionClass, arg...
Foo.Fail ExistingExceptionClass, arg...

    Public Class Methods

    included(mod) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/e2mmap.rb, line 74
def self.included(mod)
  mod.extend Exception2MessageMapper
end

    Public Instance Methods

    Fail(err = nil, *rest)
    Alias for: Raise
    Raise(err = nil, *rest) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/e2mmap.rb, line 66
def Raise(err = nil, *rest)
  Exception2MessageMapper.Raise(self.class, err, *rest)
end
    Also aliased as: Fail, fail
    bind(cl) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/e2mmap.rb, line 63
def bind(cl)
  self.module_eval "#{<<-"begin;"}\n#{<<-"end;"}", __FILE__, __LINE__+1
  begin;
    def Raise(err = nil, *rest)
      Exception2MessageMapper.Raise(self.class, err, *rest)
    end
    alias Fail Raise

    class << self
      undef included
    end
    def self.included(mod)
      mod.extend Exception2MessageMapper
    end
  end;
end
    def_e2message(c, m) click to toggle source

    #def_e2message(c, m)

        c:  exception
    m:  message_form
define exception c with message m.
    # File lib/e2mmap.rb, line 95
def def_e2message(c, m)
  E2MM.def_e2message(self, c, m)
end
    def_exception(n, m, s = StandardError) click to toggle source

    #def_exception(n, m, s)

        n:  exception_name
    m:  message_form
    s:  superclass(default: StandardError)
define exception named ``c'' with message m.
    # File lib/e2mmap.rb, line 105
def def_exception(n, m, s = StandardError)
  E2MM.def_exception(self, n, m, s)
end
